verses.english: I do not worship what you worship.
verses.hausa: "Bã zan bautã wa abin da kuke bautã wa ba."

verses.english: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.
verses.hausa: "Kuma kũ, ba ku zama masu bauta wa abin da nake bautã wa ba."

verses.english: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.
verses.hausa: "Kuma nĩ ban zama mai bautã wa abin da kuka bautã wa ba."

verses.english: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.
verses.hausa: "Kuma kũ, ba ku zama mãsu bautã wa abin da nake bautã wa ba."

verses.english: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."
verses.hausa: "Addininku na garẽ ku, kuma addinina yanã gare ni."
